fields.name: Database
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This is the name of the database that output will be written to.

fields.name: DeltaSnapshotQuery
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This query is used to fetch incremental changes from the SQL database. To use this option, we recommend using temporal tables in Azure SQL Database.

fields.name: FullSnapshotQuery
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This query is used to fetch data from the sql database.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This is the password that will be used to connect to the SQL Database instance.

fields.name: RefreshRate
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This indicates how frequently the data will be fetched from the database. It is of DateTime format.

fields.name: RefreshType
fields.description: Indicates the type of data refresh option.

fields.name: Server
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This is the name of the server that contains the database that will be written to.

fields.name: User
fields.description: This element is associated with the datasource element. This is the user name that will be used to connect to the SQL Database instance.
